field.description: m_can standby control

field.name: STBY_CLR_EN
field.description: m_can standby clear control 0:controlled by software by standby bit[bit31] 1:auto clear standby by hardware when rx data is 0

field.name: STBY_POL
field.description: standby polarity selection

field.name: TSU_TBIN_SEL
field.description: external timestamp select. each CAN block has 4 timestamp input, this register is used to select one of them as timestame if TSCFG.TBCS is set to 1

field.name: M_CAN_INT1
field.description: m_can interrupt status1

field.name: M_CAN_INT0
field.description: m_can interrupt status0

field.name: SUBSEC_DIGITAL_ROLLOVER
field.description: Format for ns counter rollover, 1-digital, overflow time 1000000000/0x3B9ACA00 0-binary, overflow time 0x7FFFFFFF

field.name: CAPT_SNAP_KEEP
field.description: set will keep capture snap till software read capt_snapl. If this bit is set, software should read capt_snaph first to avoid wrong result. If this bit is cleared, capture result will be updated at each capture event

field.name: CAPT_SNAP_POS_EN
field.description: set will use posege of input capture signal to latch timestamp value

field.name: CAPT_SNAP_NEG_EN
field.description: No description available

field.name: COMP_EN
field.description: set to enable compare, will be cleared by HW when compare event triggered

field.name: UPDATE_TIMER
field.description: update timer with +/- ts_updt, pulse, clear after set

field.name: INIT_TIMER
field.description: initial timer with ts_updt, pulse, clear after set

field.name: FINE_COARSE_SEL
field.description: 0: coarse update, ns counter add ss_incr[7:0] each clk 1: fine update, ns counter add ss_incr[7:0] each time addend counter overflow

field.name: TIMER_ENABLE
field.description: No description available

field.name: SS_INCR
field.description: constant value used to add ns counter; such as for 50MHz timer clock, set it to 8'd20

field.name: TIMESTAMP_HIGH
field.description: No description available

field.name: TIMESTAMP_LOW
field.description: No description available

field.name: SEC_UPDATE
field.description: together with ts_updtl, used to initial or update timestamp

field.name: ADD_SUB
field.description: 1 for sub; 0 for add, used only at update

field.name: NS_UPDATE
field.description: No description available

field.name: ADDEND
field.description: used in fine update mode only

field.name: TARGET_TIME_HIGH
field.description: used for generate compare signal if enabled

field.name: TARGET_TIME_LOW
field.description: No description available

field.name: PPS_CTRL
field.description: No description available

field.name: CAPT_SNAP_HIGH
field.description: take snapshot for input capture signal, at pos or neg or both; the result can be kept or updated at each event according to cfg0.bit8

field.name: CAPT_SNAP_LOW

field.name: ZCNTCFG
field.description: 1- zcnt will increment when phcnt upcount to phmax, decrement when phcnt downcount to 0 0- zcnt will increment or decrement when Z input assert

field.description: wave VdVq inject enable. 0: disable VdVq inject. 1: enable VdVq inject.

field.description: vd_vq sel ctrl: 0: from CLC. 1: from software.

field.description: wave0/1/2 output mode. 0: cosine wave. 1: saddle wave. 2. abs cosine wave. 3. saw wave

field.description: wave0/1/2 resolution

field.name: VAL
field.description: wave0 phase shifter value, default is 0x0. write other value will shift phase early as (cfg_value/2^32) period

field.description: Vd inject value

field.name: VQ_VAL
field.description: Vq inject value

field.name: LOAD
field.description: load wave0/1/2 vd vq value. always read 0 0: vd vq keep previous value. 1: load wave0/1/2 vd vq value at sametime.

field.name: EN_SCAL
field.description: enable wave amplitude scaling. 0: disable; 1: enable

field.name: AMP_VAL
field.description: amplitude scaling value. bit15-12 are integer part value. bit11-0 are fraction value.

field.name: VAL
field.description: wave0 output middle point, use this value as 32 bit signed value. bit 31 is signed bit. bit30-27 is integer part value. bit26-0 is fraction value.

field.name: LIMIT_LEVEL0
field.description: low area limit level0

field.name: LIMIT_LEVEL0
field.description: high area limit level0

register.name: min_level1
register.description: wave0 low area limit value level1

field.name: LIMIT_LEVEL1
field.description: low area limit level1

register.name: max_level1
register.description: wave0 high area limit value level1

field.name: LIMIT_LEVEL1
field.description: high area limit level1

field.name: VAL
field.description: wave0 deadzone shifter value

field.name: VAL
field.description: pwm_cycle

field.name: ABZ_OUTPUT_ENABLE
field.description: abz output enable 0abz output disable, all keep 0 1abz output enable.

field.name: REVERSE_EDGE_TYPE
field.description: pulse reverse wavereverse edge point: 0: between pulse's posedge and negedge, min period dedicated by the num line_width 1: edge change point flow pulse's negedge.

field.name: POSITION_SYNC_MODE
field.description: position sync mode: 0: only sync integer line part into qeo own position. 1: sync integer and fraction part into qeo own position.

field.name: EN_WDOG
field.description: enable abz wdog: 0: disable abz wdog. 1: enable abz wdog.

field.name: Z_POLARITY
field.description: wave_z polarity. 0: normal output. 1: invert normal output

field.name: B_POLARITY
field.description: wave_b polarity. 0: normal output. 1: invert normal output

field.name: A_POLARITY
field.description: wave_a polarity. 0: normal output. 1: invert normal output

field.name: Z_TYPE
field.description: wave_z type: 0: zero pulse type, start and end line number decided by z_startz_end and z_offset. 1: zero pulse type, z output start to high when position= z_start, and mantain numbers of 1/4 line cfg in z_pulse_width register 2: reserved 3: wave_z output as tree-phase wave same as wave_a/wave_b

field.name: B_TYPE
field.description: wave_b type: 0: Two-phase orthogonality wave_b. 1: reverse wave of pulse/reverse type. 2: down wave of up/down type. 3: Three-phase orthogonality wave_b.

field.name: A_TYPE
field.description: wave_a type: 0: Two-phase orthogonality wave_a. 1: pulse wave of pulse/reverse type. 2: up wave of up/down type. 3: Three-phase orthogonality wave_a.

field.name: LINES
field.description: wave_a/b/z resolution

field.name: VAL
field.description: wave_a phase shifter value, default is 0x0. write other value will shift phase early as (cfg_value/2^32) period.

field.name: LINE
field.description: the num of system clk by 1/4 period when using as Two-phase orthogonality.

field.name: WIDTH
field.description: wave will step 1/4 line to reminder user QEO still in controlled if QEO has no any toggle after the num of wdog_width sys clk.

field.name: POSTION
field.description: load next valid postion into abz owned postion. always read 0 0: sync abz owned postion with next valid postion. 1: not sync.

field.name: VAL
field.description: abz position overall offset, it affects abz position before resolution convert

field.name: Z_START
field.description: number of Z start line

field.name: Z_END
field.description: number of Z end line

register.name: ABZ_z_offset
register.description: zero phase start and end 1/4 line num

field.name: Z_END_OFFSET
field.description: number of Z end 1/4 line

field.name: Z_START_OFFSET
field.description: number of Z start 1/4 line

field.name: VAL
field.description: number of z_pulse_width

field.name: SHADOW_UNLOCK
field.description: write 0x first to unlock, then set related bits in unlock_sel to unlock following shadow registers(from 0x04 to 0x78), otherwise the shadow registers can not be written. The shadow registers will be loaded to work registers only when shadow_lock is 1 or lock is not enabled This bit can be cleared by set shadow_lock bit in work_ctrl1

field.name: UNLOCK_BIT
VALUE
field.description: shadow registers, if used as reload or compare point, shall be 24bit clock cycles plus 1bit half cycle and 7bit high-resolution delay

field.name: POLARITY
field.description: one bit for one pwm channel, it's used as shadow register when pwm_cfg0.polarity_opt0 is set. output polarity, set to 1 will invert the output(after pwm selection, pair mode, dead area insertion, before force/fault)

field.name: FORCE_MODE
field.description: 2bit for each PWM channel(0~7); 00: force output 0 01: force output 1 10: output highz(pad_oe_*=0) 11: no force this field may be changed by software as shadow register , the update time should be defined by chan_cfg.load, only for PWM channels.

field.name: SHADOW_LOCK
field.description: one to lock, sofware can't write any shadow registers Software have to write 0x. to work_ctrl0 to clear this bit.

field.name: TRIG_SEL4
FAULT_SEL_ASYNC
field.description: select from 16bit async fault from pad

field.name: FAULT_POL_ASYNC
field.description: fault polarity for input fault from pad, 1-active low; 0-active high;

field.name: FAULT_EN_ASYNC
field.description: set to enable the input async faults from pad directly

field.name: FAULT_EN_SYNC
field.description: set to enable the input faults from trig_mux(trigger_in[0] for channel0/1, 1 for 23, 2 for 45, 3 for 67)

field.name: POL_UPDATE_SEL
OUT_POLARITY
field.description: output polarity, set to 1 will invert the output(after pwm selection, pair mode, dead area insertion, before force/fault) when polarity_opt0 is set, this bit is controlled by shadow register, can't be writable; read as working register use compare channel settings(in cmp_cfg) as shadow register update

field.name: POLARITY_OPT0
field.description: set to use shadow polarity

field.name: HIGHZ_EN_N
field.description: 0 to highz pwm outputs(pad_oe*=0), software need set this bit to 1 to enable pwm output

field.name: FORCE_UPDATE_TIME
field.description: define when to use the shadow register value for working register(force_mode) 00: software set work_ctrl1.shadow_lock bit 01: use the related counter rld_cmp_sel0 and rld_cmp_sel1, to select one compare point 10: related counter reload time(selected by pwm_cnt) 11: use force_trig_sel to select one of the input trigger NOTE: 00/01 are not recommended since the update time is not controllable, may cause error in complex application. 00 is used for initialization or debug, not suggest for real time update

field.name: FAULT_MODE
field.description: 00: force output 0 01: force output 1 1x: output highz(pad_oe_*=0)

field.name: FAULT_REC_TIME
field.description: 00: immediately 01: after main counter reload time 10: use fault_rec_sel to select one of the input trigger 11: software write fault_clear in glb_ctrl2, no effort if pwm_fault is still assert

field.name: SW_FORCE_EN
field.description: 0 for hardware force, from trig_mux selected by pwm_force_sel 1 for software force, from glb_ctrl.sw_force

field.name: PAIR_MODE
field.description: if set to 1, PWM work at pair mode, pwm_cfg for channel 2m is used for channel 2m+1(m=0,1,2,3), except the dead area, which is separate for each channel even in pair mode software need set this bit for both channel of one pair, otherwise result unknown.

field.name: PWM_LOGIC
FORCE_TIME
field.description: 00: force immediately 01: force at main counter reload time 10: force at trig signal selected by force_act_sel 11: no force the force assert/deassert will happen at the force_time; qeo force and value also latched at this time

field.name: FORCE_TRIG_SEL
field.description: select one trigger from 8, should set to pulse in trig_mux, will load shadow register(force)mode) to force_mode_work at this time

field.name: FORCE_ACT_SEL
field.description: select one trigger from 8, should set to pulse in trig_mux, will load hw/sw force at this time

field.name: PWM_FORCE_SEL
field.description: select one trigger from 8 as force signal, should be level signal, 1 for force active, 0 for no force

field.name: FAULT_REC_SEL
field.description: select one trigger from 8, should set to pulse in trig_mux, used for fault recovery if fault_rec_time is set to 2'b10

field.name: DEAD_AREA
field.description: 16bit cycle delay plus 8bit hr_delay min value is 2 cycles, less than 0x200 will be treated as no dead area; NOTE: dead insertion must be configured with pair, that is, for pwm 01/23/45/67. otherwise the result maybe UNKNOWN!!!

field.name: TRIGGER_OUT_SEL
field.description: select one from 24 compare result as trigger out, set at compare point, clear at reload point.

field.name: SW_FORCE
field.description: software write 1 to start software force, if the pwm_cfg<n>.sw_force_en is set, force will take effort

field.name: OUTPUT_DELAY
field.description: add delay after dead_area insertiong logic, for hr_pwm

field.name: HR_PWM_EN
field.description: set to enable hr pwm, clear to bypass delay chain.

field.name: FRAC_DISABLE
field.description: set to disable bit[7:0] in DAC value when Calculation Unit use it.

field.name: DAC_SW_MODE
field.description: set for software DAC mode, software can write dac_value*_sv directly, and dac_valid from moto system is ignored

field.name: DEBUG_IN_EN
field.description: set to enable debug_in signal as fault signal, generally disable pwm output

field.name: FAULT_CLEAR
field.description: software write 1 to clear fault event if pwm_cfg.fault_rec_time is 2'b11. software need to clear it after the fault signal is de-assert and before next fault one bit for one pwm channel

field.name: SHADOW_LOCK_EN
field.description: enable shadow_lock feature, if cleared, shadow_lock will be always 0

field.name: VALUE
field.description: counter0 reload working register

field.name: VALUE
field.description: compare point working register

field.name: OUT_POLARITY
field.description: force working register

field.name: FORCE_MODE
field.description: force_mode work register

field.name: VALUE
field.description: main counter value

field.name: VALUE
field.description: save dac0_value when dac0_valid if dac_sw_mode is 0; software write dac_value directly if dac_sw_mode is 1

field.name: CAPTURE_POS
field.description: related counter value captured at input negedge

field.name: CAPTURE_SELGPIO
field.description: 0: result from CAP[ 7:0], from trgm 1: result from CAP[15:8], from gpio

field.name: CNT_INDEX
field.description: related counter

field.name: CAPTURE_NEG
field.description: counter value captured at input negedge

field.name: IRQ_CAL_OVERFLOW
field.description: end of output burst

field.name: IRQ_BURSTEND
field.description: end of output burst

field.name: IRQ_FAULT
field.description: for external fault event

field.name: IRQ_CAPTURE_NEG
field.description: capture negedge status

field.name: IRQ_CAPTURE_POS
field.description: capture posedge status

field.name: IRQ_RELOAD
field.description: when clock counter reach the reload time

field.name: IRQ_CMP
field.description: for 24 channel, compare event

field.name: IRQ_EN_OVERFLOW
field.description: enable interrupt when calculation unit overflow

field.name: IRQ_STS_CMP
field.description: interrupt flag for compare point match event, and each bit means one compare point.

field.name: IRQ_STS_RELOAD
field.description: interrupt flag for reload event , and each bit means one main counter.

field.name: IRQ_STS_CAP_POS
field.description: interrupt flag for posedge capture event , and each bit means one capture channel.

field.name: IRQ_STS_CAP_NEG
field.description: interrupt flag for negedge capture event , and each bit means one capture channel.

field.name: IRQ_STS_FAULT
field.description: interrupt flag for external fault event , and each bit means one external fault channel.

field.name: IRQ_STS_BURSTEND
field.description: interrupt flag for output burst done event , and each bit means one main counter.

field.name: IRQ_EN_CMP
field.description: interrupt enable field for compare point match event, and each bit means one compare point.

field.name: IRQ_EN_RELOAD
field.description: interrupt enable field for reload event , and each bit means one main counter.

field.name: IRQ_EN_CAP_POS
field.description: interrupt enable field for posedge capture event , and each bit means one capture channel.

field.name: IRQ_EN_CAP_NEG
field.description: interrupt enable field for negedge capture event , and each bit means one capture channel.

field.name: IRQ_EN_FAULT
field.description: interrupt enable field for external fault event , and each bit means one external fault channel.

field.name: IRQ_EN_BURSTEND
field.description: interrupt enable field for output burst done event , and each bit means one main counter.

field.name: DMA3_EN
field.description: enable dma3

field.name: DMA3_SEL
field.description: selelct one of compare point(0~23) or one reload point(24~27) as dma0

field.name: DMA2_EN
field.description: enable dma2

field.name: DMA2_SEL
field.description: selelct one of compare point(0~23) or one reload point(24~27) as dma0

field.name: DMA1_EN
field.description: enable dma1

field.name: DMA1_SEL
field.description: selelct one of compare point(0~23) or one reload point(24~27) as dma0

field.name: DMA0_EN
field.description: enable dma0

field.name: DMA0_SEL
field.description: selelct one of compare point(0~23) or one reload point(24~27) as dma0

field.name: RLD_CMP_SEL1
field.description: select one compare point from 24, set to 0x1F to disable current selection, used for reload value, compare value, force value update

field.name: RLD_CMP_SEL0
field.description: select one compare point from 24, set to 0x1F to disable current selection

field.name: RLD_TRIG_SEL
field.description: select one trigger from 8, should set to pulse in trig_mux

field.name: RLD_UPDATE_TIME
field.description: define when to use the calculation output value as reload time 00: software set work_ctrl1.shadow_lock bit 01: use compare point selected by rld_cmp_sel0 or rld_cmp_sel1 10: counter reload time 11: use rld_trig_sel to select one of the input trigger NOTE: 00 is not recommended since the update time is not controllable, may cause error in complex application.

field.name: CNT_D_PARAM
field.description: input dac data parameter

field.name: CNT_DAC_INDEX
field.description: select one of the dac value

field.name: CNT_LU_EN
field.description: set to enable up limit, use cnt_lu_off to select one of the shadow register value as limitation

field.name: CNT_LIM_UP
field.description: up limit offset selection, from one of the shadow_val

field.name: CNT_LL_EN
field.description: set to enable low limit

field.name: CNT_LIM_LO
field.description: low limit offset selection, from one of the shadow_val

field.name: CNT_IN_OFF
field.description: input data offset selection, from one of the shadow_val, default just shadow reload time

field.name: CNT_RELOAD_EN
field.description: set to use input signal(selected by cnt_reload_trig) to reload timer

field.name: CNT_RELOAD_TRIG
field.description: select one trigger from 8, should set to pulse in trig_mux

field.name: CNT_UPDATE_TRIG1
field.description: select one trigger from 8, should set to pulse in trig_mux

field.name: CNT_UPDATE_EN1
field.description: set to enable using trig1 to load calculation cell output to counter

field.name: CNT_TRIG1
field.description: change counter value to one of the calculation cell output when cnt_update_triger1 issued

field.name: CNT_UPDATE_TRIG0
field.description: select one trigger from 8, should set to pulse in trig_mux

field.name: CNT_UPDATE_EN0
field.description: set to enable using trig0 to load calculation cell output to counter

field.name: CNT_TRIG0
field.description: change counter value to one of the calculation cell output when cnt_update_triger0 issued

field.name: CNT_START_SEL
field.description: select one trigger from 8, should set to pulse in trig_mux

field.name: CNT_HW_START_EN
field.description: enable use trigger to start pwm output(at next reload point), by cnt_start_sel

field.name: CNT_BURST
field.description: output pwm wave for configured burst(timer period), 0 for one burst; 1 for two burst. set to 0xFFFF for always output pwm wave bit's only used when setting cnt_sw_start or trigger selected by cnt_start_sel

field.name: CNT_SW_START
field.description: set to start pwm output(at next reload point), write only, Auto clear. User can disable pwm output before burst end by start again with cnt_burst=0

field.name: TIMER_RESET
field.description: set to clear current timer. Auto clear

field.name: TIMER_ENABLE
field.description: 1 to enable the main cycle counter; 0 to stop the counter; NOTE: when counter stopped, the related trigger_out will be cleared to 0, the related pwm output will keep value not changed.

field.name: CAL_LU_PARAM
field.description: up limit parameter

field.name: CAL_LL_PARAM
field.description: low limit parameter

field.name: CAL_T_PARAM
field.description: period parameter

field.name: CAL_D_PARAM
field.description: dac/counter value parameter

field.name: CAL_T_INDEX
field.description: select one of 4 counter reload time

field.name: CAL_IN_INDEX
field.description: 0~3 to select one of the dac input value; 4~7 to select one of the current counter value

field.name: CAL_LU_EN
field.description: set to enable up limit

field.name: CAL_LIM_UP
field.description: up limit offset selection, select from one of the shadow_val

field.name: CAL_LL_EN
field.description: set to enable low limit

field.name: CAL_LIM_LO
field.description: low limit offset selection, select from one of the shadow_val

field.name: CAL_IN_OFF
field.description: offset for calculation unit, select from one of the shadow_val.

field.name: CMP_TRIG_SEL
field.description: select one trigger from 8, should set to pulse in trig_mux

field.name: CMP_UPDATE_TIME
field.description: define when to use the shadow register value for working register(trig_cmp) 000: software set work_ctrl1.shadow_lock bit 001: update immediately(at next cycle) 010: related counter reload time 011: use cmp_update_trigger(from trig_mux, selected by cmp_trig_sel) 100: use the related counter rld_cmp_sel0 to select one compare point 101: use the related counter rld_cmp_sel1, to select one compare point 11x: reserved, no update.

field.name: CMP_IN_SEL
field.description: 0x00~0x1B select one of the shadow_val directly 0x20~0x2F select one of the calculation cell output 0x30~0x37 select one of capture_pos value(low 8bit are 0) 0x38+k select T/4 0x3E select 0xFFFFF000 0x3F select 0xFFFFFF00 others select 0

field.name: CMP_CNT
field.description: select one from 4 counters, only for N>=16. for N<16, this field is0, every 4 compare point related to one counter(0123 for counter0, 4567 for counter1.)

field.name: TS_SEL
field.description: Time stamp selection for accumulation 0: end of accumulation 1: start of accumulation 2: center of accumulation

field.name: ACC_LEN
field.description:
Accumulate time, support on the fly change 01 cycle 12 cycles
255: 256 cycles

field.name: ACC_OUT_MASK
field.description: rdc output mask

field.name: IIR_EN
field.description: IIR enable for adc input

field.name: RECTIFY_SEL
field.description: Select reference point of rectify signal 0: 0 phase of internal exciting signal 1: 90 phase of internal exciting signal 2: 180 phase of internal exciting signal 3: 270 phase of internal exciting signal 4: use value on external pin 5: use invert value on external pin

field.name: ACC_FAST
field.description: every adc value can be as one accumulate value

field.name: ACC_EN
field.description: Enable rdc accumulate 0: rdc disable 1: rdc enable

field.name: EXC_START
field.description: Write 1 start excite signal, always read 0 0: no effect 1: start excite signal

field.name: EXC_EN
field.description: Enable rdc excite signal 0: rdc disable 1: rdc enable

field.name: ACC
field.description: accumulate result of i_channel, this is a signed number

field.name: ACC
field.description: accumulate result of q_channel, this is a signed number

field.name: PORT_Q_SEL
field.description: Input port selection for q_channel, 0:sel port0 1:sel port1

field.name: CH_Q_SEL
field.description:
Input channel selection for q_channel 0: channel 0 selected 1: channel 1 selected
31: channel 31 selected

field.name: PORT_I_SEL
field.description: Input port selection for i_channel, 0:sel port0 1:sel port1

field.name: CH_I_SEL
field.description:
Input channel selection for i_channel 0: channel 0 selected 1: channel 1 selected
31: channel 31 selected

field.name: CH_Q_SEL
field.description: Output channel selection for q_channel

field.name: CH_I_SEL
field.description: Output channel selection for i_channel

field.name: LOWPASS
field.description: IIR in lowpass mode

field.name: IIR_B
field.description: IIR parameter for b branch

field.name: IIR_A2
field.description: IIR parameter a2 for a branch

field.name: IIR_A1
field.description: IIR parameter a1 for a branch

field.name: SWAP
field.description: Swap output of PWM and DAC 0: disable swap 1: swap output

field.name: PWM_PRD
field.description: Pwm period in samples 01 sample period 1: 2 sample period ... 15: 16 sample period

field.name: SMP_NUM
field.description:
Number of sample every excitation period 0: 4 point 1: 8 point
8: 1024 point

field.name: SMP_RATE
field.description:
The period for excitation sample in clock cycle 0: not allowed 1: 1 cycle 2: 2 cycles
65535 : 65535 cycles

field.name: AMP_EXP
field.description: Amplitude scaling for excitation, amplitude = [table value] x man / 2^exp

field.name: AMP_MAN
field.description: Amplitude scaling for excitation, amplitude = [table value] x man / 2^exp

field.name: AMP_OFFSET
field.description: Offset for excitation

field.name: N_POL
field.description: Polarity of exc_n signal 0: high active 1: low active

field.name: P_POL
field.description: Polarity of exc_p signal 0: high active 1: low active

field.name: DITHER
field.description: Enable dither of pwm 0: disable 1: enable

field.name: AMP_EXP
field.description: Amplitude scaling for excitation, amplitude = [table value] x man / 2^exp

field.name: AMP_MAN
field.description: Amplitude scaling for excitation, amplitude = [table value] x man / 2^exp

field.name: AMP_OFFSET
field.description: Offset for excitation

register.name: trig_out0_cfg
register.description: Configuration for trigger out 0 in clock cycle

field.name: ENABLE
field.description: Enable trigger out0 0: disable 1: enable

field.name: LEAD_TIM
field.description:
Lead time for trigger out0 from center of low level , this is a signed value
2: 2 cycle befor center of low level 1: 1 cycle before center of low level 0: center of low level -1: 1cycle after center of low level -2: 2cycle after center of low level

register.name: trig_out1_cfg
register.description: Configuration for trigger out 1 in clock cycle

field.name: ENABLE
field.description: Enable trigger out1 0: disable 1: enable

field.name: LEAD_TIM
field.description:
Lead time for trigger out0 from center of hight level , this is a signed value
2: 2 cycle befor center of hight level 1: 1 cycle before center of hight level 0: center of hight level -1: 1cycle after center of hight level -2: 2cycle after center of hight level

register.name: pwm_dz
register.description: pwm dead zone control in clock cycle

field.name: DZ_N
field.description: Exc_n dead zone in clock cycle before swap 0: no dead zone 1: 1 cycle dead zone 2: 2 cycle dead zone

field.name: DZ_P
field.description: Exc_p dead zone in clock cycle before swap 0: no dead zone 1: 1 cycle dead zone 2: 2 cycle dead zone

field.name: PWM_OUT_DLY
field.description: Delay bettween the delyed trigger and the first pwm pulse in clock cycle 1: 1 cycle 2: 2 cycle

field.name: MIN2TRIG_EN
field.description: Enable trigger out from the min point of exciting signal 1: enable 0: disable

field.name: MAX2TRIG_EN
field.description: Enable trigger out from the max point of exciting signal 1: enable 0: disable

field.name: SYNC_OUT_SEL
field.description: Select output synchornize signal 0: 0 phase of internal exciting signal 1: 90 phase of internal exciting signal 2: 180 phase of internal exciting signal 3: 270 phase of internal exciting signal

register.name: exc_sync_dly
register.description: trigger in delay timming in soc bus cycle

field.name: DISABLE
field.description: Disable hardware trigger input 0: enable 1: disable

field.name: DELAY
field.description:
Trigger in delay timming in bus cycle from rising edge of trigger signal 0: 1 cycle 1: 2 cycle
0xffffff: 2^24 cycle

register.name: max_min_pos
register.description: max min data position of channel

field.name: MAX_MIN_POS
field.description: max min value position 0: max min value at adc input 1: max min value at IIR output

field.name: MAX
field.description: Max value of i_channel, write clear

field.name: VALID
field.description: Max value valid, write clear 0: max value is not valid 1: max value is valid

field.name: MIN
field.description: Min value of i_channel, write clear

field.name: VALID
field.description: Min value valid, write clear 0: min value is not valid 1: min value is valid

field.name: MAX
field.description: Max value of q_channel, write clear

field.name: VALID
field.description: Max value valid, write clear 0: max value is not valid 1: max value is valid

field.name: MIN
field.description: Min value of q_channel, write clear

field.name: VALID
field.description: Min value valid, write clear 0: min value is not valid 1: min value is valid

register.name: thrs_i
register.description: the offset setting for edge detection of the i_channel

field.name: THRS
field.description:
The offset setting for edge detection of the i_channel, signed number
2: the offset is 0x800000+2 1: the offset is 0x800000+1 0: the offset is 0x800000 -1: the offset is 0x800000-1 -2: the offset is 0x800000-2

field.name: THRS4ACC
field.description: enable thrs data for accumulate

register.name: thrs_q
register.description: the offset setting for edge detection of the q_channel

field.name: THRS
field.description:
The offset setting for edge detection of the q_channel, signed number
2: the offset is 0x800000+2 1: the offset is 0x800000+1 0: the offset is 0x800000 -1: the offset is 0x800000-1 -2: the offset is 0x800000-2

field.name: THRS4ACC
field.description: enable thrs data for accumulate

field.name: HOLD
field.description:
The minimum edge distance in sample 0:1 sample 1:2 sample 2:3 samples
63:64 samples

field.name: FILTER
field.description:
The continuous positive or negative number for edge detection 0: 1 1: 2
7: 8

field.name: TOXIC_LK
field.description: Toxic accumulation data be removed control 1: enable 0: disable

field.name: ACC_SHIFT
EXC_PERIOD

field.name: SFTRST
field.description: software reset the module if asserted to be1b1.

field.name: CHMD
field.description: Channel Rcv mode Bits[2:0] for Ch0. Bits[5:3] for Ch1 Bits[8:6] for Ch2 Bits[11:9] for Ch3 3'b000: Capture at posedge of MCLK 3'b001: Capture at both posedge and negedge of MCLK 3'b010: Manchestor Mode 3'b011: Capture at negedge of MCLK 3'b100: Capture at every other posedge of MCLK 3'b101: Capture at every other negedge of MCLK Others: Undefined

field.name: SYNC_MCLK
field.description: Asserted to double sync the mclk input pin before its usage inside the module

field.name: SYNC_MDAT
field.description: Asserted to double sync the mdat input pin before its usage inside the module

field.name: CH_EN
field.description: Channel Enable

field.name: IE
field.description: Interrupt Enable

field.name: CH3DRY
field.description: Ch3 Data Ready interrupt enable.

field.name: CH2DRY
field.description: Ch2 Data Ready interrupt enable

field.name: CH1DRY
field.description: Ch1 Data Ready interrupt enable

field.name: CH0DRY
field.description: Ch0 Data Ready interrupt enable

field.name: CH3ERR
field.description: Ch3 Error interrupt enable.

field.name: CH2ERR
field.description: Ch2 Error interrupt enable

field.name: CH1ERR
field.description: Ch1 Error interrupt enable

field.name: CH0ERR
field.description: Ch0 Error interrupt enable

field.name: CH3DRY
field.description: Ch3 Data Ready. De-assert this bit by reading the data (or data fifo) registers.

field.name: CH2DRY
field.description: Ch2 Data Ready

field.name: CH1DRY
field.description: Ch1 Data Ready

field.name: CH0DRY
field.description: Ch0 Data Ready

field.name: CH3ERR
field.description: Ch3 Error. ORed together by channel related error signals and corresponding error interrupt enable signals. De-assert this bit by write-1-clear the corresponding error status bits in the channel status registers.

field.name: CH2ERR
field.description: Ch2 Error

field.name: CH1ERR
field.description: Ch1 Error

field.name: CH0ERR
field.description: Ch0 Error

field.name: GATE_SAMPLES
field.description: The number-1-3 of input PDM bit samples to be gated when CIC_GATE_EN=1. Max 255. So the minimum gated samples is 4 samples when GATE_SAMPLES=0.

field.name: THRSH
field.description: FIFO threshold (0,..,16) (fillings > threshold, then gen int)

field.name: D_RDY_INT_EN
field.description: FIFO data ready interrupt enable

field.name: MANCH_THR
field.description: Manchester Decoding threshold. 3/4 of PERIOD_MCLK[7:0]

field.name: WDOG_THR
field.description: Watch dog threshold for channel failure of CLK halting

field.name: AF_IE
field.description: Acknowledge feedback interrupt enable

field.name: DFFOVIE
field.description: Ch Data FIFO overflow interrupt enable

field.name: DSATIE
field.description: Ch CIC Data Saturation Interrupt Enable

field.name: DRIE
field.description: Ch Data Ready Interrupt Enable

field.name: SYNCSEL
field.description: Select the PWM SYNC Source

field.name: FFSYNCCLREN
field.description: Auto clear FIFO when a new SDSYNC event is found. Only valid when WTSYNCEN=1

field.name: WTSYNACLR
field.description: 1: Asserted to Auto clear WTSYNFLG when the SDFFINT is gen 0: WTSYNFLG should be cleared manually by WTSYNMCLR

field.name: WTSYNMCLR
field.description: 1: Manually clear WTSYNFLG. Auto-clear.

field.name: WTSYNCEN
field.description: 1: Start to store data only after PWM SYNC event 0: Start to store data whenever enabled

field.name: D32
field.description: 1:32 bit data 0:16 bit data

field.name: DR_OPT
field.description: 1: Use Data FIFO Ready as data ready when fifo fillings are greater than the threshold 0: Use Data Reg Ready as data ready

field.name: EN
field.description: Data Path Enable

field.name: CIC_GATE_TYPE
field.description: 1: the gate cycle is determined by SDFIFOCTRLn[GATE_SAMPLES]. 0: the gate cycle is determined by the CIC decimation counter, and the minimal gated off PDM bits are determined by SDFIFOCTRLn[GATE_SAMPLES], and at the same time, to keep alignment with normal PCM sampling time.

field.name: CIC_GATE_POL
field.description: 1: When mask signal is 1, pause the CIC stage at he rising edge of mask signal. 0: When mask signal is 0, pause the CIC stage at he falling edge of mask signal.

field.name: CIC_GATE_SEL
field.description: Select the mask signal for CIC gate signal.

field.name: CIC_GATE_EN
field.description: 1: the CIC stage can be paused by the mask input. 0: the CIC stage won't be paused by the mask input.

field.name: TIMESTAMP_TYPE
field.description: 1. Use the time (when the data is calculated out) - delta_time_of_filter_span as the timestamp. 0: Use the time when the data is calculated out.

field.name: DFIFO_S_T
field.description: 1: the output of SDFIFO is data and timestamp interleaved. First is data. 0: the output of SDFIFO is data only

field.name: DATA_S_T
field.description: "1: the read output of SData is data and timestamp interleaved. First is data. 0: the read output of SData is data only"

field.name: SGD_ORDR
field.description: CIC order 0: SYNC1 1: SYNC2 2: SYNC3 3: FAST_SYNC

field.name: PWMSYNC
field.description: Asserted to double sync the PWM trigger signal

field.name: CIC_SCL
field.description: CIC shift control

field.name: CIC_DEC_RATIO
field.description: CIC decimation ratio. 0 means div-by-256

field.name: IGN_INI_SAMPLES
field.description: NotZero: Don't store the first samples that are not accurate Zero: Store all samples

field.name: PERIOD_MCLK
field.description: maxim of mclk spacing in cycles, using edges of mclk signal. In manchester coding mode, it is just the period of MCLK. In other modes, it is almost the half period.

field.name: SDATA_D0_T1
field.description: 1: next readout is timestamp 0: next readout is data

field.name: SDFIFO_D0_T1
field.description: 1: next readout is timestamp 0: next readout is data

field.name: FIFO_DR
field.description: FIFO data ready

field.name: AF
field.description: Achnowledge flag

field.name: DOV_ERR
field.description: Data FIFO Overflow Error. Error flag.

field.name: DSAT_ERR

field.name: LOOKUP_TABLE
field.description: using 4 bit trig_in as lookup index. software can program this register as trig_in's true table.

field.name: SW_INJECT
field.description: software can inject value to TYPEA's output

field.name: LOOKUP_TABLE
field.description: lut0 and lut1 union as 64bit, consider each 4bit as one slice. then, total 16 slice. slice0 as bit3:0, slice1 as bit7:4...etc. using 4bit trig in as index of slice. the operate sel in data unit of type B channle is decided by which slice value choosed by trig_in

field.name: CMP_VALUE
field.description: cmp value, using as data unit operation

field.name: TIMESTAMP_DEC_NEW
field.description: set to decrease the timesamp with new value, auto clr

field.description: set the timesamp to new value, auto clr

field.description: reset timesamp to 0, auto clr

field.description: set to enable cpu_debug_mode to stop the timesamp

field.name: TIMESTAMP_ENABLE
field.description: set to enable the timesamp , clr to stop

field.name: TIMER_ONESHOT
field.description: set for one shot mode, timer will run only once. Software need reset timer first to start another one shot

field.name: COUNTER_DEBUG_EN
field.description: set to enable cpu_debug_mode to stop the counter

field.name: CRST
field.description: 1- Reset counter

field.name: CEN
field.description: 1- Enable counter

field.name: RLD
field.description: counter reload value

field.name: VALUE
field.description: new value for timesamp , can be used as set/inc/dec

field.name: CNT
field.description: counter

field.name: VALUE
field.description: use the trigger to save timesamp here

field.name: VALUE
field.description: current timesamp value

field.name: CMP
field.description: comparator value, the output will assert when counter count to this value

field.name: WATCH
field.description: Enable watch dog 0: Watch dog disabled 1: Watch dog enabled

field.name: ARMING
field.description: Wait for trigger before excuting 0: Execute on enable 1: Wait trigger before exection after enabled

field.name: EXCEPT
field.description: Explain timout as exception 0: when timeout, pointer move to next instruction 1: when timeout, pointer jump to timeout vector

field.name: REWIND
field.description: Rewind execution pointer 0: run 1: clean status and rewind

field.name: ENABLE
field.description: Enable 0: disable 1: enable

field.name: DAT_CDM
field.description: Select DATA register to receive CDM bit in BiSSC slave mode 0: ignore 1: command 2: data register 2 3: data register 3 ... 29:data register 29 30: value 0 when send, ignore in receive 31: value1 when send, ignore in receive

field.name: DAT_BASE
field.description: Bias for data register access, if calculated index bigger than 32, index will wrap around 0: real data index 1: access index is 1 greater than instruction address 2: access index is 2 greater than instruction address ... 31: access index is 31 greater than instruction address

field.name: POINTER_WDOG
field.description: Pointer to the instruction that the program starts executing after the instruction timeout. The timeout is WDOG_TIME

field.name: POINTER_INIT
field.description: Initial execute pointer

field.name: WDOG_TIME
field.description: Time out count for each instruction, counter in bit time.

field.description: Execution has been triggered 0: Execution not triggered 1: Execution triggered

field.description: Watchdog timer expired 0: Not expired 1: Expired

field.description: Program finished 0: Program is executing 1: Program finished

field.name: VALUE_A_OFFSET
field.description: value_a offset

field.name: VALUE_B_OFFSET
field.description: value_b_offset

field.name: VALUE_C_OFFSET
field.description: value_c offset

field.name: IRQ_STATUS
field.description: irq status bit: bit0: vsc convert done irq. bit1: in adc three-phase mode, if ABS(value_a+value_b+value_c) > adc_phase_tolerate, will trigger irq. bit2: value_c overflow during capture process. bit3: value_b_overflow during capture process. bit4: value_a_overflow during capture process. bit5: adc2 chan not capture enough adc value. bit6: adc1 chan not capture enough adc value. bit7: adc0 chan not capture enough adc value. bit8: position not got valid before pos_wait_cycle timeout. bit9: adc2 wait cycle timeout. bit10: adc1 wait cycle timeout. bit11: adc0 wait cycle timeout. bit12: trigger_in break vsc convert even if adc or position is ready.

field.name: VALUE_A_SW
field.description: value_a_sw

field.name: VALUE_B_SW
field.description: value_b_sw

field.name: VALUE_C_SW
field.description: value_c_sw

field.name: VALUE_SW_READY
field.description: software inject value_a/value_b/value_c ready

field.name: TRIGGER_SW
field.description: software trigger to start waiting adc capture value, same as hardwire trigger_in

register.name: timelock
register.description: timestamp mode and postion capture ctrl

field.name: POSITION_CAPTURE_MODE
field.description: postion capture mode: 00: position use last valid data when adc value capture finish 01: position use frist valid data after adc value capture 10: position use last valid data before adc value capture other: reserved

field.name: ADC_TIMESTAMP_SEL
VALUE_COUNTER_SEL
field.description: adc timestamp use which number index of adc_timestamp_sel used.

register.description: pos wait cycle after trigger adc capture event

field.name: POS_WAIT_CYCLE

field.name: IRQ_ENABLE
field.description: irq enable bit: bit0: vsc convert done irq. bit1: in adc three-phase mode, if ABS(value_a+value_b+value_c) > adc_phase_tolerate, will trigger irq. bit2: value_c overflow during capture process. bit3: value_b_overflow during capture process. bit4: value_a_overflow during capture process. bit5: adc2 chan not capture enough adc value. bit6: adc1 chan not capture enough adc value. bit7: adc0 chan not capture enough adc value. bit8: position not got valid before pos_wait_cycle timeout. bit9: adc2 wait cycle timeout. bit10: adc1 wait cycle timeout. bit11: adc0 wait cycle timeout. bit12: trigger_in break vsc convert even if adc or position is ready.

field.name: ADC_PHASE_TOLERATE
field.description: in adc three-phase mode, if ABS(value_a+value_b+value_c) > adc_phase_tolerate, will trigger irq.

register.name: eadc_lowth
register.description: &index0 eadc_lowth value used in error adc cofficient selection

field.name: EADC_LOWTH
field.description: if error adc not bigger than eadc_lowth or not less than eadc_highth, use zone 2 cofficientif not less than midlowth and not bigger than midhighth, use zone 0 cofficientotherwire, use zone 1 cofficient

register.name: eadc_highth
register.description: &index0 eadc_highth value used in error adc cofficient selection

field.name: EADC_HIGHTH
field.description: if error adc not bigger than eadc_lowth or not less than eadc_highth, use zone 2 cofficientif not less than midlowth and not bigger than midhighth, use zone 0 cofficientotherwire, use zone 1 cofficient

register.name: eadc_midlowth
register.description: &index0 eadc_midlowth value used in error adc cofficient selection

field.name: EADC_MIDLOWTH
field.description: if error adc not bigger than eadc_lowth or not less than eadc_highth, use zone 2 cofficientif not less than midlowth and not bigger than midhighth, use zone 0 cofficientotherwire, use zone 1 cofficient

register.name: eadc_midhighth
register.description: &index0 eadc_midhighth value used in error adc cofficient selection

field.name: EADC_MIDHIGHTH
